results.content: very good course, to learn the basics of React and all... Before doing it be sure you familiar with Typescript and Javascript... Concepts and structure is good.. Instructor sometimes confusing but in general you can keep up

results.content: Okay all fine, I found the source code online and one can fall back on it in case you get stacked. The Tutor's approach is good for beginers but for middle and advanced students who want to move through faster, you have no time to be looking at html and css. My interest is to master react typescript intead of jsx. I would recommend the tutor to all.
